 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרְגַּז‎</span> **noun masculine** ==box, chest==, or like receptacle (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***a kind of*** (camel-) ***vehicle for women***, also ***a garment containing stones***, etc., as balance, makeweight (at side of ***haudaj***); from above √, as ***swaying ?*** Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sack***, Talmud <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְגָּז‎</span> ***chest, coffin***); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָא‎</span> [[1Sam.6.8|1Sam 6:8]]; [[1Sam.6.11|1Sam 6:11]]; [[1Sam.6.15|1Sam 6:15]], compare [[BDB#HPS|HPS]].
